tool_description: Tests power supply functionality, voltage rails, and power delivery to system components to identify power-related hardware issues.

expected_wattage.description: Expected power supply wattage rating in watts

test_duration_seconds.description: Duration of power test in seconds (30-600)

error_messages: Invalid wattage: Expected wattage must be between 200-2000 watts.
Invalid test duration: Test duration must be between 30-600 seconds.
Power supply not detected: Ensure power supply is connected and system has power.
usage: Specify the expected_wattage of your power supply unit. Optionally set test_duration_seconds. The tool will test voltage rails and power stability.
